Author: armheartbrain
Text: The best things in life are the things that you are equally excited for but terrified of.   Good luck!

Author: myjjn
Text: I thought I would basically die of starvation once I would start living alone but after that initial period of restricting a lot and losing weight, I got this realization that I can also eat whatever I like and eat as much of it as a I want at any time of the day, without anyone there to stop me, so it actually made me gain weight in the end lmao. But then again, I fasted for the first time in my life while living alone. That could never happen when I lived at home because nobody would allow me to fast. Living alone makes it easy to be more extreme with eating it seems (in both directions). Anyways, please take care of yourself and be safe!
